task.title: Removing the Rear Axle
task.shortdesc: This task describes the procedure for removing the rear from the vehicle.

prereq.p: Ensure you have access to the vehicle's underside and appropriate tools for the procedure.

step.cmd: Jack up the car and remove the rear wheels
Remove the universal ball cap bolts
step.info: Take out the four bolts that connect the universal ball cap to the transmission case and cover
Remove the nuts that secure the spring perches to the rear axle housing flanges

step.cmd: Raise the frame and remove the axle

substep.cmd: Raise the frame at the rear end
